visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and include configurations for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart's background is set to a light gray color (#f9f9f9), and margins are adjusted for better spacing. The x-axis represents months with styled labels in a darker gray color (#666666) and a font size of 14px. The y-axis is titled 'Temperature (°C)' with similarly styled labels. The data series, named 'Temperature', uses a specific color (#FF6347) to represent the monthly average temperatures. The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a font size of 14px. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and accessible chart with clear labels and a well-defined data series.
